alert.note: Alert for Delta Junction; Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Upper Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 05 at 8:18PM AKDT until October 06 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow. Snow accumulations of up to one inch, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley, Delta Junction and Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Driving and walking surfaces will develop become very slippery. Travel could be very difficult. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of freezing rain and snow is occuring along the Alaska Highway east of Dot Lake, and is expected to spread to the Richardson and Alaska Highways from Delta Junction south later this evening. A light glaze of ice is expected to accumulate on walking and driving surfaces tonight making them very slippery. Freezing rain will mix with snow at times. Precipitation will taper off early Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Delta Junction; Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Upper Tanana Valley
